short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you play FIFA Ultimate team? This extension adds more quality of life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you play Ultimate Team? This extension add more quality of life.
Features:
- Block users or spam in FUTBIN and FUTHEAD
- Quick Link to player price on FUTBIN
- Auto-buy player on Ultimate team web-app
